title: Microsoft starts testing ‘Lists’ task manager with personal accounts
content:
Microsoft To-Do has been available for years as a simple task management application for mobile and desktop, but the company has also maintained a more powerful alternative for businesses and other large organizations. Microsoft Lists is a super-charged task manager with a greater focus on collaboration, and now Microsoft is starting to open it up

The post Microsoft starts testing ‘Lists’ task manager with personal accounts appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft Lists, the company's advanced task management system, is now available to free personal Microsoft accounts in a limited trial.
